entries.journal_entry_description: [Businessman] has lost an important prototype. Find the thief and return his stolen property.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: [Businessman] has lost a precious prototype. No ships have been allowed to leave the station. The thief must be here somewhere. Find the thief.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The thief has made an interesting argument against returning the prototype to [Businessman]. What is the best way to proceed?
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return the fake prototype to [Businessman] and get paid for the job.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You were paid for returning a false prototype.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: [Thief]'s buddy Gremlo is going to try to convince you to return without the prototype.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Gremlo is out of the way. Talk to Thief and get the prototype from him.
